text:
The ability to upload more file types in the Design Manager which many of you have been playing with in Sandbox portals is now available in all portals through the local development tooling! <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-development>. Additionally, `.svg` is now supported! Run `npm install -g @HubSpot/cms-cli` to update to the latest version of the CMS CLI to get access.

<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CEQQ9NFK2/p1575303756064500>
